Articles.Content:
I just read the [parachutes thread](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/57646?p=770729&viewfull=1#post770729) linked in the [START HERE](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/94638-Mod-Development-Links-Compilation-START-HERE) sticky and it makes mention that a parachute **requires** 2 animations.

okay fine, I figured out how to make animations in blender on my own, but I have no clue how to create multiple animations.

I'm using Blender v2.73, please help?

- - - Updated - - -

Ah, nevermind, I found a good tutorial here:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Gb152Qncn2s?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
 but the sound is low so you might want to download it and amplify.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-12T03:01:53Z" title="04/12/2015 03:01  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 12, 2015</time> by Xyphos**
  
Solved
